alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Lee; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 2:56PM CDT until April 06 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lee County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Elmore County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Martin Dam, or 7 miles north of Tallassee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camp Hill, Notasulga, Waverly, Martin Dam, Southern Lake Martin, Still Waters Resort, Loachapoka, Roxana, Blue Creek Marina, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
